# AggregationStrategy

### Description

Indicates how a [CatalogPricingRule](#type-catalogpricingrule) can be combined with other rules.

## Properties
Name | Type
------------ | -------------
**UNKNOWN** | string
**BASE** | string
**STACKABLE** | string
**EXCLUSIVE** | string

Note: All properties are protected and only accessed via getters and setters.
